capabilities.name: Manage and Develop People
capabilities.description: Leading a multi-disciplinary team to deliver science programs, requiring advanced people management skills.

capabilities.name: Inspire Direction and Purpose
capabilities.description: Communicating goals and vision for science programs related to estuaries and freshwater catchments.

capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Responsible for project development, implementation, and delivery, ensuring high-quality outcomes.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Addressing key threats and risks to NSW marine estate, requiring problem-solving for environmental challenges.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Open communication and collaboration within the department and with external stakeholders.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Working with a geographically dispersed team and external partners to deliver science programs.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Coordinating resources, managing budgets, and delivering reports for scientific projects.

capabilities.name: Act with Integrity
capabilities.description: Adhering to public sector values and department policies in managing scientific projects.

skills.name: Leadership in Science
skills.description: Leading and developing rigorous science programs and teams.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Establishing and fostering relationships with government agencies, external clients, and collaborators.

skills.name: Environmental Science
skills.description: Expertise in estuaries, freshwater catchments, and environmental management.

skills.name: Project Coordination
skills.description: Managing the development, implementation, and delivery of scientific projects.

generalRole.title: Environmental Science Program Leader
generalRole.description: This role involves leading a team in the development and delivery of science programs focused on estuaries and freshwater catchments, aiming to inform and improve environmental policy and management.
